title: Educommunication Strategies for Strengthening Knowledge-Based Content Management Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and content management experience
context.additional_context: A course for corporate managers/leaders to enhance content management capabilities in language domains to a level applicable in real-world settings, with practice-centered education utilizing learners' personal devices (BYOD).

learning_goals: Learners can integrate various digital literacies to design a system for collecting, categorizing, and utilizing knowledge-based content.
Learners can optimize team knowledge-sharing processes by applying information communication techniques.
Learners can establish content management strategies using data-driven decision-making models.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
